name: Jaidi Stupid Long Legs -Daddy's Endless Arcade
name_original: Jaidi Stupid Long Legs -Daddy's Endless Arcade
description:
Stretch the Daddy Jaidi Leg in order to reach and walk on the platforms. Watch out! If the Legs Open Wide enough, you will fall down!
How far can you go?
Control long leg. Tap to screen to keep long leg rotation. Very easy gameplay
With Jaidi stupid Leg. You will have fun time to relax
The goal of Jaidi Stupid Leg is very simple, walk as far as you can. But long legs five times longer than the rest of your body, walking is not very easy task. Simply tap the screen to change long leg and watch as Long Legs stumbles across the screen.

Do you like impossible or challenging games? Are you looking for an almost impossible brainteaser game for your IOS device?
After the great success on IOS “Ali Numan” presents “Jaidi Stupid Long Legs Challenge” . With a unique game-play similar to daddy long legs or mommy long legs, it’s an ultimate walking simulator and an endless fun game for your IOS. Download the game and help stupid Jaidi the walker in his endless walking ventures. Our ridiculous jaidi walker has very long legs, five times longer than his body. It’s ridiculous!
Walking with these long legs is hard as a matter of fact it’s very challenging and almost impossible to walk for jaidi. The question is can you help jaidi walker to walk? Do you accept the challenge?
If you think that walking on long legs is easy, you should try “jaidi Stupid Long Legs Challenge”. I bet you can’t score more than 20 points in this brainteaser or too tough endless game!

How to Play:
Game-play of this longlegs simulator is pretty simple but not easy! The aim is to go as far as possible by walking on these platforms and don’t let jaidi fall down. Stretch jaidi the walker’s Leg in order to reach and walk on the platforms. Watch out! If the legs open too wide, jaidi will fall down!
Game-Play Features:
• Optimized for all IOS devices including tabs • Simple, eye catchy graphics and backgrounds • A challenging and endless walking game-play • Movie quality sounds  • Free to download and install on your device

This almost impossible brainteaser fun game will test your nerves and focus. You’ll need some great skills and focus to score high in “Jaidi Stupid Long Legs Challenge”. It’s a must have game on your device if you like challenging games like daddy long legs or mommy long legs. Make sure to have some really good practice before challenging your friends and family.

Why are you still reading all this and wasting your time? It’s time to hit download button and install the game. Have fun!

Please leave us a rating and review to let us know what you think about this impossible stupid walker challenge. We always want to continue to deliver some of the best and most fun games possible, and your feedback plays an important role in us being able to achieve this goal.
